p: Statute for Members of the European Parliament
p lang: and in particular Articles 9 and 10 thereof.

p: Implementing measures for the Statute for Members of the European Parliament
p lang: and in particular Articles 1 and 2 thereof.

p: This appropriation is intended to cover the salary provided for by the Statute for Members.
The amount of assigned revenue in accordance with Article 21(3) of the Financial Regulation is estimated at EUR 5 000.
Statute for Members of the European Parliament
Implementing measures for the Statute for Members of the European Parliament
p lang: and in particular Articles 25 to 28 thereof.

p: This allowance is intended to cover — in accordance with the abovementioned articles of the Implementing measures for the Statute for Members of the European Parliament — expenses resulting from the parliamentary activities of Members.
The amount of assigned revenue in accordance with Article 21(3) of the Financial Regulation is estimated at EUR 25 000.
Statute for Members of the European Parliament
p lang: and in particular Articles 14 and 28 thereof.

p: Implementing measures for the Statute for Members of the European Parliament
This appropriation is intended to cover the payment of an old-age pension after the cessation of a Member’s term of office.
The amount of assigned revenue in accordance with Article 21(3) of the Financial Regulation is estimated at EUR 50 000.
Statute for Members of the European Parliament
Implementing measures for the Statute for Members of the European Parliament
p lang: and in particular Articles 51 to 57 and 75 thereof.

p: This appropriation is intended to cover the payment of a pension to Members who become incapacitated during their term of office.
The amount of assigned revenue in accordance with Article 21(3) of the Financial Regulation is estimated at EUR 5 000.
Statute for Members of the European Parliament
Implementing measures for the Statute for Members of the European Parliament
p lang: and in particular Articles 58 to 60 and 75 thereof.

p: This appropriation is intended to cover the payment of a survivor’s and/or orphan’s pension in the event of the death of a Member or of a former Member.
The amount of assigned revenue in accordance with Article 21(3) of the Financial Regulation is estimated at EUR 15 000.
Statute for Members of the European Parliament
Implementing measures for the Statute for Members of the European Parliament
This appropriation is intended to cover the institution’s contribution to the additional voluntary pension scheme for Members.
The amount of assigned revenue in accordance with Article 21(3) of the Financial Regulation is estimated at EUR 5 000.
This appropriation is intended to cover the effects of any salary adjustments decided by the Council during the financial year.
It is provisional and may be used only after its transfer to the appropriate headings of this chapter.
This appropriation is intended to cover the effects of any salary adjustments decided by the Council during the financial year.
It is provisional and may be used only after its transfer to the appropriate headings of this Chapter.
This appropriation is intended to cover rent for the buildings or parts of buildings occupied by the European Parliament.
The amount of assigned revenue in accordance with Article 21(3) of the Financial Regulation is estimated at EUR 1 500 000.
Financial contributions from Member States or their public agencies or entities in the form of financing or repayment of costs and of associated charges relating to the purchase or use of land
column15: as well as of charges in relation to buildings and facilities of the institution
column16: shall be considered as external assigned revenue within the meaning of Article 21(2) of the Financial Regulation.
